itemDescription: Librarian of the University of Cambridge and Rector of Cumberworth and Anderby

wikipedia_page.main: John Lodge (1792/93 – 27 August 1850) was the librarian (bibliothecarius) of the University of Cambridge from 1828 to 1845.

response: * John Lodge (musician) (born 1945), bass guitarist for the Moody Blues
* John Lodge (archivist) (died 1774), English historian who wrote The Peerage of Ireland
* John Lodge (librarian) (1792–1850), librarian of the University of Cambridge

link_mentions.page: List of University Librarians at the University of Cambridge
